info.name: Dark Dota 2 Wiki
info.description: Darkens up the colors on the Dota 2 Wiki. There were an incredible amount of inline styles, making this extremely difficult to make.
info.additionalInfo:
License can be viewed here: https://userstyles.org/users/277242

Git repository: https://bitbucket.org/DeathTBO/tbos-stylish

Version 2.2

Been a long time :P

Updated ability background, and changelog backgrounds. Probably a few other changes.

Version 2.1

Minor style fixes.

Version 2.08

Fixed the style not applying to HTTPS.

Version 2.07

Fixed ability cards.

Version 2.06

Fixed tabs.

Version 2.05

Fixed tournament view.

Version 2.04

Fixed warning and edit helper.

Version 2.03

Fixed odd row colors.

Version 2.02

Fixed Aghanims Scepter upgrades list.

Version 2.01

Fixed white box on item rarity list.

Version 2

This style has been completely overhauled.
